oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Announcement - Brad Paisley Love And War video album launch - 2017-04-23. Part two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Event surrounding the launch of the 2017 Band Against Cancer initiative by Sarah Cannon, the Cancer Institute of HCA, in partnership with Brad Paisley and Sony Music Nashville. Event held at the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 23, 2017. Includes remarks pertaining to the just screened music video album for Paisley's Love And War project. Does not include audio from the video album. Part two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brad Paisley; Bill Anderson; John Fogerty;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Applause from video album screening begins in progress / (00:13) Comments from Brad Paisley / (01:57) Introduction of Bill Anderson and comments on songwriting with Bill / (04:46) Comments by Bill Anderson about song writing with Brad / (06:26) Brad introduces John Fogerty and presents him with a prototype Fender guitar / (09:14) Comments from John Fogerty about co-writing Love And War / (12:30) Brad talks about about he and John taking over Tootsie's later tonight and closing comments / (13:22) Closing comments about exiting / (13:42) Walk-out music / (15:55) FILE END.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Paisley, Brad; Anderson, Bill, 1937-; Fogerty, John; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
